name: Tentoban
description:
Push and rotate the laser cannons and mirrors to light up all gates in a sokoban like world..

Sokoban is an interesting game, and it is even more interesting when the goal becomes lighting up the gate with laser cannons and mirrors in a Sokoban world! Tento means to light up in Japanese, by mixing with sokoban, we have Tentoban.

Laser cannons, mirrors, and gates may be rotatable or non-rotatable, movable or non-movable, and your goal is to push and rotate them to any position that can light up all of the gates.

If you are not satisfied with the campaign levels, you can even create your own one and challenge other players, or accept the challenges from other players!
